forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain this evening, with showers continuing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain this evening, with showers continuing overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 10C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
